numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows data about people from 15 years to 24 years.
2. Many people from 15 years to 24 years believe that the world is getting better.
3. Some people from 15 years to 24 years do not believe that the world is getting better as much.
4. I wonder what data the graph would show for people from 40 years to 70 years.
5. I think that the data would change a little bit if the age range was from 40 years to 70 years.
7. I believe that the world is getting better slowly.
8. The headline is: Is the world getting better, says 15 to 24 year-olds?
